div.span: Business Applications Engineer - Group Segment B2B

span.div: Location: Louisville, KY (In-Office) or WAH anywhere within the United States

The ideal candidate for the Business Applications Engineer role would be an inquisitive Software developer/consultant /engineer who is able to quickly understand business processes and business needs, translate them into actionable logical design capsules and corroborate end-to-end system solutions using a combination of appropriate technology and tools. As a part of the B2B Automation Centre of Excellence, the Business Engineers will be responsible to implement process automation solutions using a combination of BPM tools, Robotics Process Automation (RPA), custom programming, API and Services and Analytics in a fast paced agile development environment. They must be experienced with Real-life project execution, SDLC methodologies, current trends in solution automation. They must be able to demonstrate an all-round experience in end-to-end solution delivery.

Experience in Statistical analysis using SAS, Big Data/Cloudera
Project Management experience is highly preferred
Experience with Agile Project management tools like VersionOne, Jira

font.font: You will report to a Strategic Consultant, Process Support-Analytics and Automation-GSO

div.span: Humana Inc., headquartered in Louisville, Ky., is a leading health care company that offers a wide range of insurance products and health and wellness services that incorporate an integrated approach to lifelong well-being. By leveraging the strengths of its core businesses, Humana believes it can better explore opportunities for existing and emerging adjacencies in health care that can further enhance wellness opportunities for the millions of people across the nation with whom the company has relationships.
